name: WIRES (JM)
description:
WIRES:

Try connecting the plugs to the correct socket, but be careful not to get shocked.

Made in 8 days for LÖVE Jam 2023.

Instructions:

- Move the glove using the mouse.

- Click the mouse's left button to grab/connect the plugs.

- Release the glove with mouse's right button.

- You can pause the game pressing Enter.

Tips:

- For each 3 levels completed, you earn 10 extra seconds.
